name: Ninja Showdown
description:
Have you ever wanted to practice your ninja jutsu abilities in a fight-to-the-death-action-adventure-FPS -arcade-I-don't-know-what-else-to-call-it game? Now you can!

Defeat enemies and acquire pickups to earn a high score. Enemies have a chance to drop hearts that restore your health, or ninja scrolls that contain secret ninja techniques that will unlock new abilities.  The ninja world becomes more difficult the longer you survive... Good luck!

Move with WASD. Throw kunai with left click on the mouse, and unlock new abilities to be used with right click, and the 1, 2, and 3 keys on the keyboard. Close the ninja scroll UI popup with E, and you can return to the main menu at any time with Escape. All comments appreciated, hope you enjoy!
